item.title: PickelC2-Bot
item.description: PickleC2-Bot This discord bot will help you to control your target through PickleC2 Download WHAT’s a PickleC2? PickleC2 is a simple C2 framework written in python3 used to help the community in Penetration Testers in their red teaming engagements.
